spec_data.Name: perl-POE-Component-Syndicator
spec_data.Description:
POE::Component::Syndicator is a base class for POE components which need to
handle a persistent resource (e.g. a connection to an IRC server) for one
or more sessions in an extendable way.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:51:10 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: POE component base class which implements the Observer pattern
